question: Who among the following was the fourth man to walk on the Moon & died?
explanation: Former US astronaut Alan Bean, who was the fourth man to walk on the Moon died in Texas, United States. He was 86. Bean went into space twice, the first time in November 1969 as the lunar module pilot on the Apollo 12 moon-landing mission. In 1973 he was commander of the second crewed flight to Skylab- America's first space station. Bean retired from NASA in 1981.
